meanings.definition: The state or quality of being puffy.
meanings.sent1: The puffiness of the clouds made them look like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent2: Her eyes showed signs of puffiness after crying all night.
meanings.sent3: The puffiness of the marshmallows made them irresistible for toasting.
meanings.sent4: The puffiness of the pastry dough indicated it was ready to be baked to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The puffiness of the cotton candy made it seem like edible clouds.

meanings.sent1: The cat's face had a cute puffiness after eating too much food.
meanings.sent2: She woke up with a puffy, puffiness feeling in her cheeks.
meanings.sent3: The puffiness cheeks of the squirrel made it look like it was storing nuts.
meanings.sent4: The puffiness balloon slowly deflated after being pricked by a needle.
meanings.sent5: The puffiness cheeks of the chipmunk made it look like it was storing extra acorns.
